Name: Mouse Dreams
About the game: Get the cheese, then get to the exit. It's that easy! Or is it? Mouse Dreams is a puzzle platformer with bright, colourful graphics, where you must solve puzzles by pushing boxes, manipulating light, strategically powering objects like moving platforms and doors. In this single-screen puzzle platformer, you must navigate increasingly challenging levels with simple platforming and whimsical puzzles. Defy gravity, avoid the ghosts, use moving platforms, and more! Mouse Dreams has been carefully designed to give you a fun, smooth learning curve from the easy early puzzles through to the challenging late-game puzzles. You can always try a different puzzle if you get stuck, then go back and finish those you had trouble with later.
